CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`user_id` TEXT NOT NULL, `accessibility_mode` TEXT NOT NULL, `content_delivery_mode` TEXT NOT NULL, `screen_reader_enabled` INTEGER NOT NULL, `talkback_optimized` INTEGER NOT NULL, `speech_rate` TEXT NOT NULL, `announce_focus_changes` INTEGER NOT NULL, `font_scale` REAL NOT NULL, `contrast_level` TEXT NOT NULL, `reduce_motion` INTEGER NOT NULL, `large_text_enabled` INTEGER NOT NULL, `bold_text_enabled` INTEGER NOT NULL, `subtitles_enabled` INTEGER NOT NULL, `sign_language_mode_enabled` INTEGER NOT NULL, `haptic_feedback_enabled` INTEGER NOT NULL, `audio_descriptions_enabled` INTEGER NOT NULL, `voice_navigation_enabled` INTEGER NOT NULL, `gesture_navigation_enabled` INTEGER NOT NULL, `simplified_navigation_enabled` INTEGER NOT NULL, `prefer_audio_content` INTEGER NOT NULL, `prefer_text_content` INTEGER NOT NULL, `prefer_visual_content` INTEGER NOT NULL, `auto_read_content` INTEGER NOT NULL, `extended_time_for_quizzes` INTEGER NOT NULL, `quiz_time_multiplier` REAL NOT NULL, `created_at` INTEGER NOT NULL, `updated_at` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`user_id`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` TEXT NOT NULL, `user_id` TEXT NOT NULL, `session_id` TEXT NOT NULL, `message` TEXT NOT NULL, `is_user_message` INTEGER NOT NULL, `response_mode` TEXT NOT NULL, `context_subject` TEXT, `context_chapter` TEXT, `audio_url` TEXT, `is_cached` INTEGER NOT NULL, `timestamp` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `user_id` TEXT NOT NULL, `subject_id` TEXT NOT NULL, `chapter_id` TEXT, `event_type` TEXT NOT NULL, `duration_seconds` INTEGER NOT NULL, `score` REAL, `mistakes_count` INTEGER NOT NULL, `accessibility_mode` TEXT NOT NULL, `content_type` TEXT NOT NULL, `interaction_count` INTEGER NOT NULL, `timestamp` INTEGER NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `user_id` TEXT NOT NULL, `command_text` TEXT NOT NULL, `recognized_action` TEXT NOT NULL, `was_successful` INTEGER NOT NULL, `timestamp` INTEGER NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`quizId` TEXT NOT NULL, `chapterId` TEXT NOT NULL, `currentQuestionIndex` INTEGER NOT NULL, `selectedAnswersJson` TEXT NOT NULL, `timeRemainingSeconds` INTEGER NOT NULL, `quizPhase` TEXT NOT NULL, `lastUpdatedAt` INTEGER NOT NULL, `startedAt` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`quizId`))
